data.expected_result: the warning should be removable by clicking on the X since there is no call to reconnect to
data.short_description: [Stable] `connected at another location` warning gets stuck after leaving the group/server while in call
data.steps_to_repro: - join the same call using a IOS/Android device - notice how a *dismissible* warning shows on top of your screen with the option to reconnect - leave the GDM/server without leaving the call on the other device - try to remove the warning by clicking on reconnect or the X in the top right corner
